ack.title: Acknowledgment
ack.p: The authors wish to thank Mr.A. Sudershan Reddy and Mr. Ramakrishna from the TSDPS, Government of Telangana for the provision of meteorological information for research purposes and Dr. Deepti Vissa for related articles on coronavirus. The authors wish to acknowledge the support of our Department of eyeSmart EMR and AEye team specially Mr. Ranganath Vadapalli and Mr. Mohammad Pasha.
